review.reviewBody: Great ma po tofu, with a bit of sweetness, not too sour

All the things I ordered were so tasty and cooked to perfection. The curry beef brisket was tender and not too spicy. The sweet and sour pork had a nice flavour and was not the tangy sauce. Salted egg and pork congee was just right. Flat pan-fried beef noodles were great too. Will definitely order again and more.

Very disappointing this time, the honey garlic ribs was lack of any garlic and the honey coating was sparingly thin. The Hoianese chicken was lack of flavor likeit  supposed to be and just meaty not the right kind of chicken the restaurant had before!!
Was very disappointing about the honey garlic ribs. There wasn't any garlic in it and the coating of honey was very very thin. Also the chicken was lack of taste just meat
